video_description: L'anteprima del tablet S7 Slim che Huawei ha presentato al Mobile World Congress di Barcellona. Dispone di Android 2.2, fotocamera posteriore da 3,2 Mpixel e anteriore Vga.
title: Huawei S7 Slim anteprima CellulareMagazineit_ITA

comments.text: Why would you want to buy this product. They launched the Huawei s7 and never intended to let you upgrade to android 2.2. for the first tablet that came out. It crashed ALL the time. can't get 3G with most carriers and trying to get in contact with customer support...FORGET IT!!!! This﻿ is a Chinese company that is flooding the American market with crap and taking our hard earned money. People your not gonna get what you pay for your getting worse.
